hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DEBUG
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true, prints out would be calls to other jobs, but does not go through with them.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x
CLI=/var/lib/jenkins/jenkins-cli.jar HOST=http://localhost:8080/ LANDSCAPE=$(echo $LANDSCAPE | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') EC2_IDS=()
case "$LANDSCAPE" in "sandbox") EC2_IDS=("i-099de1c5407493f9b" "i-0c2d2ef87e98f2088");; "ci") EC2_IDS=("i-0258a5f2a87ba7972" "i-0511b83a249cd9fb1");; "qa") EC2_IDS=("i-011ccd29dec6c6d10");; "stage") EC2_IDS=("i-090d188ea237c8bcf" "i-0cb479180574b4ba2");; "prod") EC2_IDS=("i-0534c4e38e6a24009" "i-07d7b5f3e629e89ae");; esac
for i in $(seq ${#EC2_IDS[@]}); do EC2_ID=${EC2_IDS[i-1]} if [ $i -eq 1 ] ; then # A) FULL BUILD AND DEPLOY (maven & docker) # (NOTE: several parameters are ommitted to invoke their default values.) CMD1="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'apache-shibboleth-1-docker-build-image' -v -f"
CMD2="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'apache-shibboleth-2-docker-push-image' -v -f"
CMD3="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'apache-shibboleth-3-docker-run-container' -v -f \ -p EC2_INSTANCE_ID=${EC2_ID} \ -p LANDSCAPE=${LANDSCAPE}" else # B) DEPLOY ONLY (docker) # Use aws CLI only to get new docker container running against updated image on target EC2 instance. # It is assumed the corresponding docker image is already in the registry and will be the last one put there by jenkins. # (NOTE: any parameters ommitted will invoke the default values.)
CMD1="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'apache-shibboleth-3-docker-run-container' -v -f \ -p EC2_INSTANCE_ID=${EC2_ID} \ -p LANDSCAPE=${LANDSCAPE}" fi
if [ -n "$CMD1" ] ; then [ "$DEBUG" == true ] && echo $CMD1 || eval $CMD1 CMD1='' fi
if [ -n "$CMD2" ] ; then [ "$DEBUG" == true ] && echo $CMD2 || eval $CMD2 CMD2='' fi
if [ -n "$CMD3" ] ; then [ "$DEBUG" == true ] && echo $CMD3 || eval $CMD3 CMD3='' fi
done
set -x
